formula.name: New Formula
formula.code: if (chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.15 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4 > 1){chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.movingAverage * 0.15 - chart.at01hs.bollingerBand.deviation * 4} else {takeProfit}
